title: Redroad
description:
The Redroad app has been designed to total control your robot, from home layout to cleaning schedules, cleaning strength, and more. Once you've set it up the way you want it, you can leave your robot to work.

---- Feature Highlights ----

SERIOUSLY SMART MAPPING
After it's first run around your home, your Redroad robot will show you your floorplan and automatically divide your rooms, unlocking a world of customizations.

ADVANCED SCHEDULING
Set multiple schedules from hourly to daily to weekly, hitting different rooms with each one. 

CUSTOMIZABLE CLEANING
Users can choose "free" and "intelligent" control of the App to switch the cleaning mode at will, helping users in complex environments (with children, pets, too many rooms, and many ground items), and in different areas (kitchen, bedroom, living room, toilet, etc.) to complete different modes of cleaning.

ZONE CLEANING
Draw up to five zones when you want to tackle more stubborn dirt or just don't need the entire room cleaned.

MULTI-LEVEL MAPPING
Save up to five maps in your home and tailor cleaning to match each floor. Your robot will recognize the floor it's on automatically, so you can simply watch it work.

E-mail: info@redroadglobal.com
